hasMessage.hasTextContent: Verapamil   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   nintedanib .  Manufacturer advises monitor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Nintedanib causes bleeding, as can volanesorsen ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet count—consult product literature.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Nintedanib   causes   bleeding, as can   volanesorsen   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet count—consult product literature .

hasDitaContent.@value: Voriconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to nintedanib. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voriconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   nintedanib .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both nintedanib and vortioxetine can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  nintedanib  and  vortioxetine  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Warfarin causes bleeding, as can nintedanib ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Warfarin   causes   bleeding, as can   nintedanib   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .
